name: Gramercy Tavern's Crossfire
description: This play on the classic Blood & Sand cocktail from Gramercy Tavern in NYC crosses the rich flavors of rum with sweet Cherry Heering and bitter, aromatic Bonal.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 orange

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add all of the ingredients. Shake well for at least 15 seconds and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass.
